mapper.sql: id, car_brand, car_model, car_config, guidance_price, purchase_person, purchase_money, sale_person, sale_date, sale_money, expense_company, business_expense_fee, force_expense_fee, expense_rebate, agency_fee, pay_money, paid_money, consumer_property, consumer_resource, purchase_use, consumer_name, consumer_sex, consumer_age, consumer_address, consumer_phone, sale_type, other_cost, other_income, mortgage_id, record_status, ctime, utime
mapper.select: select auto_increment from information_schema.TABLES where TABLE_SCHEMA='cm' and TABLE_NAME='cm_new_car'
mapper.insert: insert into cm_new_car (id, car_brand, car_model, car_config, guidance_price, purchase_person, purchase_money, sale_person, sale_date, sale_money, expense_company, business_expense_fee, force_expense_fee, expense_rebate, agency_fee, pay_money, paid_money, consumer_property, consumer_resource, purchase_use, consumer_name, consumer_sex, consumer_age, consumer_address, consumer_phone, sale_type, other_cost, other_income, mortgage_id, record_status, ctime, utime) values (#{id},#{carBrand},#{carModel},#{carConfig},#{guidancePrice},#{purchasePerson},#{purchaseMoney},#{salePerson},#{saleDate},#{saleMoney},#{expenseCompany}, #{businessExpenseFee},#{forceExpenseFee},#{expenseRebate},#{agencyFee},#{payMoney},#{paidMoney},#{consumerProperty},#{consumerResource},#{purchaseUse}, #{consumerName},#{consumerSex},#{consumerAge},#{consumerAddress},#{consumerPhone},#{saleType},#{otherCost},#{otherIncome},#{mortgageId},#{recordStatus},#{ctime},#{utime})
mapper.update:
update cm_new_car
car_brand = #{carBrand},
car_model = #{carModel},
car_config = #{carConfig},
guidance_price = #{guidancePrice},
purchase_person = #{purchasePerson},
purchase_money = #{purchaseMoney},
sale_person = #{salePerson},
sale_date = #{saleDate},
sale_money = #{saleMoney},
expense_company = #{expenseCompany},
business_expense_fee = #{businessExpenseFee},
force_expense_fee = #{forceExpenseFee},
expense_rebate = #{expenseRebate},
agency_fee = #{agencyFee},
pay_money = #{payMoney},
paid_money = #{paidMoney},
consumer_property = #{consumerProperty},
consumer_resource = #{consumerResource},
purchase_use = #{purchaseUse},
consumer_name = #{consumerName},
consumer_sex = #{consumerSex},
consumer_age = #{consumerAge},
consumer_address = #{consumerAddress},
consumer_phone = #{consumerPhone},
sale_type = #{saleType},
other_cost = #{otherCost},
other_income = #{otherIncome},
mortgage_id = #{mortgageId},
record_status = #{recordStatus},
utime = #{utime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from cm_new_car where id = #{ id, jdbcType=INTEGER };
